articles.title: Video: Why the yen is so weak and what's next - ForexLive
articles.description: Why the yen is weakening, the impact of rate differentials, possibilities of intervention, and what lies ahead in the forex market.
articles.content:
The
weakening yen is unpopular in Japan and pressure is mounting on politicians for
action but there are no easy answers. I spoke with BNNBloomberg about the issues:

articles.description: Financial companies scramble to rework contracts and tie down personnel after US Federal Trade Commission rule
articles.content: The US Federal Trade Commissions action to ban non-compete agreements has left Wall Street businesses rushing to restructure contracts and find new ways to tie down the high-priced personnel that the… [+6666 chars]
